message:
I am getting File "/opt/django-dpp/dpp-externals/django/http/multipartparser.py" in read
  405.         return self._file.read(num_bytes)

Exception Type: IOError at ...upload...
Exception Value: request data read error
Definetively the client is not stopping the upload - it happens between 2 and 3 minutes upload time.

You know I've been seeing the same thing, but I haven't been getting any feedback about failures from the users, so I wasn't quite sure what to make of it. For the most part, I see this on uploads that are not large (4-5M) so I'm left scratching my head.
In our case the upload time is the critical factor. size varies from 1mb to 130mb, depending on the connection speed.
In our case the upload time is the critical factor. size varies from 1mb to 130mb, depending on the connection speed.

Apache version is 2.2.21
mod_wsgi is 2.3
python is 2.5.5
solaris 10 on Intel
Are you using boto by any chance?
I had the same issues last year and gave me quite hell. Simply adding a timeout to the http socket made it work
this has not solved our problem....
